comment.author: 32267822@N08
comment._content:
This photo appears in a book 'The Living Races of Mankind' Volume 2
It was published in 1904. There are a lot of good photos in this book. The narrative is interesting, but very much of its time. Needless to say, the English are the finest people on God's Earth ;-)

A google search will give some more details, including a substantial part of the book in google books.

The photo is attributed to 'Schroeder'

comment.author: 8632382@N08
comment._content: Ottimi particolari in questo ritratto dalla forte impronta pittorica molto interessante, dove il bilanciamento cromatico e la buonissima nitidezza con l’ottima risoluzione hanno restituito una bella risoluzione Molto interessante e sapientemente bilanciata è l’inquadratura con la perfetta focalizzazione del soggetto principale il cui risalta notevolmente grazie alle sfumature a degradare dei piani focali anteriori e posteriori. Questa ripresa macro risulta molto gradevole ma sopratutto brillante. Complimenti per la buona riuscita dello scatto You deserve Thank you for sharing with us!

comment.author: 36494471@N06
comment._content: Dear Group Member: Thank you for posting your photo to ✢~ Legacy Gallery ~✢ . As clearly posted on the groups front page and in the rules that you agreed to before joining, we do require that for each photo you send to the group you give 1 comment within the first 3 pages using our group comment code, which we feel is more than fair and only takes a few moments to do. Unfortunately, our comment inspectr did not find a comment (using our group comment code) given by you. **Therefore, your photo posted has been removed from the group pool and also from any and all challenges and excellence threads it may be posted in** *3 strikes against you will result in immediate removal from this group* Please Note: This group does NOT accept reposting. If caught, you will be removed without notice to you. If you feel this message is unfair or embarrassing, and you wish to block any of the admin/mod team because of it, that will also result in removal from group membership. *In the long run you should not blame the creator or team as it is your error to begin with, and not ours* Do have a lovely day/night on flickr Happy Postings
